title: Mid-Channel
description:
The marriage of Theodore and Zoe Blundell is not going well, but before divorcing they consider a trial separation. Will they get back together and live happily-ever-after? Clayton Hamilton, a critic of the day, said: "It is not at all excessive to assert that no finer dramatic composition has been written in the English language within the first two decades of the twentieth century." - Summary by ToddHW

Cast list:
